data.text: @ssteen25 @tamatrader1 @Reuters The optics and political winds have changed, but the science hasn’t. Masks were never effective, and lockdown cost/benefit was far worse than expected.

@Reuters They should not. Switzerland removed all masks 10 days ago, and nothing is happening in schools (few cases here and there, but less than when masks were mandatory). Cases continue decreasing, and nothing to worry about

@adk_tk @Reuters Yeah it doesn't exactly work like that though. It's been proven that masks are effective if worn by all in a room. Because then everybody keep their germs to themselves and don't spread into the room. If only 1 wears but 20 don't, then that 1 is still protected, but not a lot.
@tamatrader1 @Reuters That is part of the problem, and the science has changed. Mask’s were never as affective as they claimed.
@adk_tk @Reuters Same as if you are scared, dont smoke! I'd say allow people smoke indoors!
@Reuters People that continue to want kids masks are either cowards or monsters.  I'll let them choose which.
@Reuters Very very easy to fix, if you are scared and want to wear a mask wear it. Simple
@Reuters I thought parents have no say in schools?
@Reuters 24 Respondiendo Jesús, les dijo: Yo también os haré una pregunta, y si me la contestáis, también yo os diré con qué autoridad hago estas cosas.
